relation: There is no Greek Life to speak of...
Not enough people participate in the clubs and activities available to them!!! However, there are quite a few that are available.
There isn't much to do for fun, especially if you don't have a car....
As at any college, the cafeteria food gets boring after a while. It's all highly edible though.
Dorm life is kind of stale, many of the students here are commuters and do not stay over weekends.
Most of my classes have been challenging but fulfilling.
If you are looking for a party school, then Walsh isn't for you. However, if you are looking to get the most out of your education and truly learn something, Walsh is great!
Walsh is a small Catholic University in North Canton Ohio. It offers excellent international study opportunities. All of the professors are really nice and truly care about your education.
pageTitle: Walsh University Reviews: Student Reviews and Ratings | Cappex
TableContextTimeStampAfterTable: {101580=The food at Walsh is not the best and considering that they even remodeled you would think the food would be better, but it sucks. The dining is only open for a few hours, so if you can't go because your in class until 7:30 good luck eating dinner. They have now opened the grill until later and allowed students to use their swipes for meals instead of their cash., 33949=It is quite expensive to go here. For the fall 2012 semester, it is about $17,000. During the spring of 2012, it was about $16,000, so tuition is rising, but so is everything else in the economy. There is financial assistance for those who need it., 127297=© 2015, Cappex.com, LLC}

textAfterTable: Share any unusual traditions or locations on campus we have a great chapel, new buildings, and everything is within walking distance. Bang for the buck walsh, though a little pricey, is worth every dollar in my opinion. What to do for fun belden village is a few minutes away, leading to much fun. Food and Dining there are many places to get food on campus, and it is all tasty. Dorm Life the dorms are super nice. Academic Rigor walsh classes are challenging, but the teachers are willing to stay as long as needed. also, many tutors and help is available. Tips for prospective students keep grades up and study hard. In three sentences walsh university is a great learning environment. the staff, faculty, and students alike have every person's best interests in mind. walsh is truly concerned with furthering both education and well-being.
